content: this shirt is worked in 2 pieces the right half and the left half the two halves are seamed at the shoulders and sleeves and center back the front bands and collar are crocheted directly onto the shirt after seaming to change color fasten_off the old color and join the new color at beginning of row/round with a standing double_crochet the standing double_crochet will replace the beginning chain-3 on the color change row/rounds only finished measurements chest 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 66 length 24½ 25 25½ 26 26½ 27 27½ 28 28½ materials premier® yarns cotton fair® 52% cotton 48% acrylic 3 5oz/100g 317yds/290m c1 27-38 sugar cookie 2 3 3 3 4 4 5 5 5 balls c2 27-33 juniper 2 3 3 3 4 4 5 5 5 balls hooks & notions us size 7 4 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle removable stitch markers 9 9 9 9 10 10 10 10 10 ⅜ buttons skills/techniques used in this pattern chain single and double_crochet stitch seaming with mattress stitch standing double_crochet sewing on buttons working in row and turned rounds
